contentrichtext.text: '''[[Sasquatch]]''' is another name for Bigfoot, an ape-like creature of North American folklore. '''Sasquatch''' can also refer to: *[[Sasquatch (comics)]], two related superhero characters in Marvel Comics *[[Sasquatch (book)|''Sasquatch'' (book)]], a 1998 novel written by Roland Smith *[[Sasquatch! Music Festival]], an annual summer music festival held at the Gorge Amphitheater in George, Washington *[[Sasquatch (Darkstalkers)]], character based on Bigfoot and the Yeti in the ''Darkstalkers'' fighting game series *[[Sasquatch (ride)]], a S&S Worldwide drop ride at Great Escape amusement park *''[[The Untold|Sasquatch]]'', an alternate title for the 2002 horror film ''The Untold'' {{disambig}}
